short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a transparent tint over the entire content area

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: As an alternative to dark mode, this extension covers the entire content area with a semi transparent rectangle.  The original colours remain the same except with a darker tint.  It still allows mouse and keyboard inputs to pass through.  Users who suffer from discomfort from using computer screens with Pulse-Width Modulation PWM may now turn the brightness all the way up to 100%.
